structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

text.section: Each client shall be provided access to central dining, a laundry facility, and a central living room.
Each assisted-living community shall comply with applicable building and life safety codes as determined by the building code or life safety code enforcement authority with jurisdiction.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000.
